CardData.FlavorText:
<line-height=100%><size=200%>Y</size>ou're confident that one last assault should dispatch your foes. The way should then be clear to the wagons and the captive Bilbo. Just then, a cold breeze passes through the glade. It carries the stench of carrion and the promise of death and loss. 
<size=200%></size>The fear in your enemies' eyes changes to fury. With teeth bared in grins as foul as the wind, they rally to attack!
